CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL($CustomMetadata.System_Default__mdt.System_Defaults.Default_Client_Brand_Key__c, 'BluewaveLogo'), IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Client_Brand_Key__c),"Amp"), "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002xuLS", "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a0000036Brv" ), CASE(TEXT(Client_Brand_Key__c), "AmpBlack", LEFT( $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_100, FIND( ".com", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_100 ) + 4)& "sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0685b00000Kjxt7&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5b00001BakyB", "AmpRed", LEFT( $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_100, FIND( ".com", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_100 ) + 4)& "sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0685b00000Kjxu5&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5b00001Bal07", LEFT( $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_100, FIND( ".com", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_100 ) + 4)& "sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0685b00000KjxvT&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5b00001Bal65" ) )
CustomField.label: Link to Client Logo
